page.title: 04East Herrington
page.content:
In{East Herrington}there is a wide variety of styles of houses. We found detached, semi-detached, bungalows, flats and terraced houses. Each house has a front and rear garden. The majority also have a garage. Most of the houses are built of brick with slate roofs.
Between two housing estates there is a large open area set aside for industrial development. There are roads, streetlights, gas and water mains but up to now there is no sign of building. { { Tunstall Lodge Farm}has a number of fields which are used for growing barley and hay. There is a small riding school for local children.
